SEARCH
Package us.ullberg.startpunkt.service

Class ApplicationService

java.lang.Object
us.ullberg.startpunkt.service.ApplicationService
@ApplicationScoped public class ApplicationService extends Object
Service class for managing Application custom resources in Kubernetes. Provides CRUD operations for Application CRDs.

  • Method Details

    • createApplication

      public Application createApplication(String namespace, String name, ApplicationSpec spec)
      Creates a new Application custom resource in the specified namespace.
      Parameters:
      namespace - the namespace to create the application in
      name - the name for the application resource
      spec - the application specification
      Returns:
      the created Application resource

    • updateApplication

      public Application updateApplication(String namespace, String name, ApplicationSpec spec)
      Updates an existing Application custom resource.
      Parameters:
      namespace - the namespace of the application
      name - the name of the application resource
      spec - the updated application specification
      Returns:
      the updated Application resource

    • deleteApplication

      public boolean deleteApplication(String namespace, String name)
      Deletes an Application custom resource.
      Parameters:
      namespace - the namespace of the application
      name - the name of the application resource
      Returns:
      true if deleted successfully

    • getApplication

      public Application getApplication(String namespace, String name)
      Gets an Application custom resource.
      Parameters:
      namespace - the namespace of the application
      name - the name of the application resource
      Returns:
      the Application resource or null if not found

    • isReadOnly

      public boolean isReadOnly(Application application)
      Checks if an Application is owned by another resource (read-only).
      Parameters:
      application - the application to check
      Returns:
      true if the application has owner references

    • getOwner

      public Optional<io.fabric8.kubernetes.api.model.OwnerReference> getOwner(Application application)
      Gets the first owner reference for an application.
      Parameters:
      application - the application to check
      Returns:
      Optional containing the first owner reference if present
